com.palomamobile.android.sdk.user

Interface IUserService


  • public interface IUserService
    This interface is consumed by the Retrofit library to provide access to the Paloma Mobile Platform User Service RESTful API. All calls are synchronous. To get a concrete implementation of this interface call IServiceManager.getService() This class provides somewhat low level access to the Server API it may be more convenient to use methods in IUserManager.
    See Also:
    Paloma Mobile Platform User Service RESTful API

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      User getUser(String requestId, long userId)
      Return an existing User that matches the provided userId on success.
      User registerUser(String requestId, IUserCredential userCredential)
      Register a new User with the provided userCredential.
      User updateUser(String requestId, long userId, UserUpdate userUpdate)
      Update and return an existing User that matches the provided userId on success.
      User validateCredentials(String requestId, IUserCredential userCredential)
      Return an existing User that matches the provided credentials on success.

    • Method Detail

      • registerUser

        User registerUser(String requestId,
                IUserCredential userCredential)
        Register a new User with the provided userCredential. If such User already exists it is returned. Throws retrofit.RetrofitError on failure.
        JobRegisterUser provides a convenient wrapper, consider using it instead.
        Parameters:
        requestId - for the purposes of identifying retries
        userCredential -
        Returns:
        new or existing user

      • validateCredentials

        User validateCredentials(String requestId,
                       IUserCredential userCredential)
        Return an existing User that matches the provided credentials on success. Throws retrofit.RetrofitError on failure.
        JobLoginUser provides a convenient wrapper, consider using it instead.
        Parameters:
        requestId - for the purposes of identifying retries
        userCredential -
        Returns:
        existing user

      • getUser

        User getUser(String requestId,
           long userId)
        Return an existing User that matches the provided userId on success. Throws retrofit.RetrofitError on failure.
        JobGetUser provides a convenient wrapper, consider using it instead.
        Parameters:
        requestId - for the purposes of identifying retries
        userId -
        Returns:
        existing user

      • updateUser

        User updateUser(String requestId,
              long userId,
              UserUpdate userUpdate)
        Update and return an existing User that matches the provided userId on success. Throws retrofit.RetrofitError on failure.
        JobPostUserUpdate provides a convenient wrapper, consider using it instead.
        Parameters:
        requestId - for the purposes of identifying retries
        userId -
        Returns:
        existing user
